name: child_comments
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool get_100_success_instagram_api_scalable_robust.
Tool description: 750 requests a minute, 100% success rate Instagram API, any scale is supported. Need help/ custom plan? contact us on Telegram: https://t.me/apimaster10 Join the channel for updates: https://t.me/socialdataapis
API description: Get child comments list

commentid.description: The ID of the parent comment.

mediaid.description: The ID of the media the comment belongs to.

max_id.description: The max_id parameter for pagination in the API request. Default is None.

min_id.description: The min_id parameter for pagination in the API request. Default is '{}'.
